title: Corned beef and onion pie
description: Corned beef has been a favourite store cupboard staple for generations. Here The Hairy Bikers use it to make a simple, hearty pie.
ingredients: 2 celery sticks, trimmed, peeled to remove stringy bits, sliced
300g/10½oz potatoes, preferably Maris Pipers, peeled and cut into 1cm/½in dice
300g/10½oz plain flour, plus extra for rolling
